2026-0147
2026-02-24PMOOfficial Residences ActAppointment of the Special Assistant at the Prime Minister's ResidenceOrder (1) Appointing Daniela Visean, Special Assistant at the Prime Minister's residence; and (2) fixing her remuneration and conditions of employment, effective March 2, 2026.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Special Assistant at the Prime Minister's Residence
precis: Order (1) Appointing Daniela Visean, Special Assistant at the Prime Minister's residence; and (2) fixing her remuneration and conditions of employment, effective March 2, 2026.
